parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "PSD" (Partidul Social Democrat) and implies a connection to G. Simion, suggesting an attempt to influence voters' perception of the PSD's actions regarding Simion's potential presence in a second round of elections.  While it doesn't name a specific candidate, it clearly refers to a political party participating in the parliamentary elections.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The targeting parameters (age, gender, location) further confirm its intention to address a broad segment of the population.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post's statement "INCREDIBIL CE FACE PSD pentru a-l avea pe G. Simion in turul 2" ("INCREDIBLE WHAT PSD IS DOING TO HAVE G. Simion IN THE SECOND ROUND") aims to influence voters' opinions about the PSD's strategies and potentially sway their voting choices. The phrasing is designed to evoke a negative reaction towards the PSD.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. It presents a biased and opinionated view, lacking evidence or factual substantiation. The use of the word "INCREDIBIL" ("INCREDIBLE") indicates a subjective and emotionally charged statement rather than objective reporting.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. While presented as an opinion, the statement is clearly intended to influence voters' perceptions of the PSD and its actions. It's not a personal reflection but a political statement aimed at impacting the electoral outcome.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>386674257771104</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, with its explicit reference to the PSD and its implication regarding G. Simion's presence in a potential second round of elections, constitutes electoral propaganda.  The post's objective is clearly to influence voters' perceptions of the PSD, potentially affecting their voting decisions. The lack of objectivity and the emotionally charged language further support this conclusion. While the post doesn't directly advocate for or against a specific candidate, its impact on the electoral landscape is undeniable.  The targeting parameters indicate an attempt to reach a wide audience, making it a clear case of electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>G. Simion</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PSD</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Fruncea, pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postari pe Facebook dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 386674257771104, care contine mesajul "INCREDIBIL CE FACE PSD pentru a-l avea pe G. Simion in turul 2",  avand ca efect electoral inducerea unei opinii negative asupra PSD si a lui G. Simion, influentand astfel votul alegatorilor.  Postarea, platita si vizibila publicului larg, indeplineste toate criteriile materialului de propaganda electorala prevazut in art. 36 alin. (7) din Legea nr. 334/2006, fiind difuzata dupa incheierea campaniei electorale, incalcand astfel prevederile legale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
